TextView.android:text: The Accountable Officer shall issue accountable forms to the requesting collector to be use on issuing official receipts to the people who pay tax, fees and charges.
- Municipal Treasurer Personnel, who is primary job is revenue collection \n- Barangay Treasurer
Case 1: For the Municipal Treasurer Personnel
1.1. Receive clients’ request of issuance receipt
2. Received the accountable forms and sign-in in the logbook
2.1. Record in the logbook and release the issued accountable forms to collector
3. Accomplish the Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS) and drop it in the Feedback Box
3.1. Request the client to accomplish the Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS)
1. Submit request of issuance receipt (RIS) and deposit slip
1.1. Receive clients’ request of issuance receipt and deposit slip
2.1. Receive payment and issue official receipt
3. Waiting for the release of the requested accountable form
3.1. Issue accountable forms and record the inventory in the logbook
4. Received the accountable forms and sign-in in the logbook
4.1. Release the issued accountable forms to collector
5. Accomplish the Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS) and drop it in the Feedback Box
5.1. Request the client to accomplish the Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS)
Certificate of Transfer of Large Cattle
Certificate of Ownership of Large Cattle
